## Company--wide reports

Organization--wide reports are accessible from within the dashboard and are provided in two forms: ***full*** and ***abridged***.^[The full report contains descriptive information regarding survey results including overall engagement scores, motives, components, individual item rankings, and any previous--years' results comparisons. The abridged report contains an overall engagement aggregate and individual item rankings. Both reports also provide context to the broader survey as well as [VIBE]{.vibe} personnel contact information. Neither report includes normative/benchmark information regarding comparisons to other organizations or work--group filtered results (this comparative information is only included in the client dashboard).] 

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
